subject: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Dear,
 
I am Mrs.Jane Mandy Banat  a Widow and Cancer patient 
from Australia but based in the USA now
, I want you to assist me so that UBA  America will release my Late husband Mr. Ali Banat 51,000,000.00USD in their bank to you because this fund is Charity,
 
You are going to use 21,000,000.00 for Charity and 20,000,000.00 for you and 10,000,000.00 for me, and the reason why I contacted you is because I am very sick and I can't be able to handle this myself. So get back to me for more details. Please I need your honesty.
 
Mrs.Jane Mandy Banat

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Mandy Banat,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about your situation, and I would be happy to assist you. Could you please provide me with more details about the fund and how I can help? It's important for me to understand the specifics before moving forward.

Additionally, I hope you're taking care of yourself amidst your illness. Please let me know how I can best support you in this process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Valerie

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Greetings my beloved

Thank you very much for your response and your readiness in assisting me to
complete my late husband last wish, please don't be bothered as to why you
have been contacted for this and its genuineness as I have done so from a
pure motive, my late husband was an Australian businessman, later a
humanitarian philanthropist from the Sydney suburb of Greenacre and of Arab
descent. He was running two lucrative businesses, a security company and an
electrical company, when he was diagnosed with cancer in October 2015.
After the cancer diagnosis, he donated everything he had for charitable
causes but he Died 29 May 2018 in Sydney, New Wales, Australia leaving
$51,000,000.00 in the UBA AMERICA with the aim of disbursing that portion
to the less privileged but he did not fulfill that before his death I
promised him that I will accomplish his last wish on earth but right now
doctors said I have limited days on earth to live.

I humbly need your assistance so that UBA bank will release the money to
you to begin the charity work in your country on behalf of my family.

For me to be rest assured that you are not a ROBOT , I will love my late
husband's family lawyer to conduct a live VIDEO CALL, MEETING with you for
all parties to be rest assured. If you agree to the terms and conditions to
do a video call , then kindly introduce yourself by giving me your details
as listed below.

Full Name.........................................
Address.............................................
Country...........................................
Occupation........................................
Religion:...........................................
Marital Status:.....................................
Your What's-app numbers:.....................
Your photograph pictures for

If I receive your details today, I have invited my late husband's family
lawyer to arrange for a live video call meeting for us to be rest assured.
I am seriously struggling with life at the moment, see my little video
attached to this message, please keep it confidential.
Thanks,
Rgds,
Mrs. Jane Eva Banat

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Mrs. Jane Eva Banat,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your story. I'm sorry to hear about the passing of your late husband. It sounds like he was a generous person who wanted to make a difference in the world.

I understand that you are seeking assistance in fulfilling his last wish of disbursing the funds to the less privileged. It's admirable that you want to continue his charitable work. However, before we proceed, I have a few questions.

Could you please provide more details about the amount of money involved and how it is currently being held by UBA bank? Additionally, what specific type of charity work did your late husband intend for this money to be used for?

Regarding the live video call with your family lawyer, could you please share their name and contact information? It would be helpful to know more about them and their role in this process.

Lastly, I appreciate that you shared a video attachment with me. However, for security reasons, I am unable to open or view any attachments at this time. Could you please provide more information about its contents?

Thank you once again for considering me for this opportunity. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Valerie

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Dear  Valerie,

May God bless you, I was very happy to receive your email and  the  content
was  well understood. I am attaching a Fund Deposit Certificate from the
bank  as requested, I am currently in an Intensive care center due to my
situation,  I am doing this short video for you to see my present look.  I
want you to do a charity projects across your country by providing food and
health services to support the less privileged and also build a charity
organization in  memory of my late husband Mr. Ali Banat FOUNDATION which
will be managed by you to help the helpless. Below are the contact details
to Barrister Edward. I invited him from AUstralia to see to all legal
procurement of  every  document which  the bank might be needing.

Edward Robert Attorney At Law
Email him at barristeredwardschambers@gmail.com
Call him on his WhatsApp number immediately you receive my message
+61 480 002 403

Add him to your whatsapp contact so that he will conduct the live video
verification before  the  bank will  release  the funds to your account
to  begin the  charity work. keep me  posted  as you contact  him.

Yours Sincerely
Mrs Jane Mandy.

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
How are you doing today?

I am pleased to write to you again after my last email. I hope this email
finds you well. Please kindly let me know if you are willing to carry out
this assignment or I should continue my search.
Thanks
Mrs Jane Mandy Banat

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Mrs. Jane Mandy Banat,

I hope this email finds you well too. I'm doing alright, thank you for asking. Could you please remind me about the assignment you mentioned in your previous email? I apologize if I have forgotten any details. I would be happy to hear more about it and see if I can assist you.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Valerie

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Dear Mrs. Jane Mandy,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your situation. I'm sorry to hear that you're currently in an intensive care center, and I hope you're receiving the necessary care and support.

I appreciate your trust in me to carry out charity projects in memory of your late husband, Mr. Ali Banat. It's a noble cause, and I would be interested in learning more about it.

Before I contact Barrister Edward, could you please provide some additional information about the charity work? What specific types of projects are you looking to support? And how do you envision the funds being utilized?

Once I have a better understanding of the details, I will reach out to Barrister Edward as per your instructions. Please take care of yourself, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Valerie

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Valerie,

Thank you for your email, I want you to understand this, due to
medical reasons I am not allowed to use my phone often, that is the reason
why I want you to communicate with Edward. Referring to your question, I
want you to build a charity organization in  memory of my late husband Mr.
Ali Banat FOUNDATION in your country which  will  be managed by you to help
the  poor and children, old people and sick people too. That is all I want.
you can keep  the rest of  the money for  yourself and your  family. then
$10,000,000.00 will be used for  my medical bills and some other
outstanding  family issues which Barrister Edward is aware of. He will
instruct you regarding that when  the time  comes.  please  get  in touch
with hom.
Thanks
Mrs Jane MAndy Banat

subject: Re: Hello Dear,
body:
Hello Valerie,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm sorry to hear about your medical condition, and I hope you're doing okay. It's kind of you to think of helping others through a charity in memory of your late husband.

I would like to know more about the Mr. Ali Banat Foundation and how it operates. Could you please provide some details about the specific goals and objectives of the foundation? Additionally, what kind of support or assistance would be expected from me if I were to get involved?

Also, could you tell me a bit more about Barrister Edward? How does he fit into this situation, and what role does he play in managing the foundation?

Best wishes,
Valerie
